verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד׀ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid [A Psalm] of David בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [be] the LORD צוּרִ֗י <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Ri, my strength הַֽמְלַמֵּ֣ד <S%H3925><s%> ham-lam-Med which teacheth יָדַ֣י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dai my hands לַקְרָ֑ב <S%H7128><s%> lak-Rav; to war אֶ֝צְבְּעוֹתַ֗י <S%H676><s%> etz-be-'o-Tai, [and] my fingers לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah. to fight

חַסְדִּ֥י <S%H2617><s%> chas-Di My goodness וּמְצוּדָתִי֮ <S%H4686><s%> u-me-tzu-da-Ti and my fortress מִשְׂגַּבִּ֪י <S%H4869><s%> mis-gab-Bi my high tower וּֽמְפַלְטִ֫י <S%H6403><s%> u-me-fal-Ti and my deliverer לִ֥י li מָ֭גִנִּי <S%H4043><s%> Ma-gin-ni my shield וּב֣וֹ u-Vo חָסִ֑יתִי <S%H2620><s%> cha-Si-ti; and [he] in whom I trust הָרוֹדֵ֖ד <S%H7286><s%> ha-ro-Ded who subdueth עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi my people תַחְתָּֽי׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tai. under

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God מָה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom what [is] man וַתֵּדָעֵ֑הוּ <S%H3045><s%> vat-te-da-'E-hu; that thou takest knowledge בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of him [or] the son אֱ֝נ֗וֹשׁ <S%H376><s%> e-Noosh, that וַֽתְּחַשְּׁבֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2803><s%> Vat-te-chash-she-Ve-hu. that thou makest account

אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom Man לַהֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> la-He-vel to vanity דָּמָ֑ה <S%H1819><s%> da-Mah; is like יָ֝מָ֗יו <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mav, his days כְּצֵ֣ל <S%H6738><s%> ke-Tzel [are] as a shadow עוֹבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> o-Ver. that passeth away

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD הַט־ <S%H5186><s%> hat- Bow שָׁמֶ֣יךָ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Mei-cha thy heavens וְתֵרֵ֑ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-te-Red; and come down גַּ֖ע <S%H5060><s%> ga' touch בֶּהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> be-ha-Rim the mountains וְֽיֶעֱשָֽׁנוּ׃ <S%H6225><s%> Ve-ye-'e-Sha-nu. and they shall smoke

בְּר֣וֹק <S%H1299><s%> be-Rok Cast forth בָּ֭רָק <S%H1300><s%> Ba-rok lightning וּתְפִיצֵ֑ם <S%H6327><s%> u-te-fi-Tzem; and scatter שְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> she-Lach them shoot out חִ֝צֶּ֗יךָ <S%H2671><s%> chitz-Tzei-cha, thine arrows וּתְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <S%H2000><s%> u-te-hum-Mem. and destroy

שְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> she-Lach Send יָדֶ֗יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha, thine hand מִמָּ֫ר֥וֹם <S%H4791><s%> mi-Ma-Rom from above פְּצֵ֣נִי <S%H6475><s%> pe-Tze-ni rid וְ֭הַצִּילֵנִי <S%H5337><s%> Ve-hatz-tzi-le-ni me and deliver מִמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> mi-Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; me out of great מִ֝יַּ֗ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad, from the hand בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei children נֵכָֽר׃ <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char. of strange

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hem Whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> Shav; vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> ye-Min [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. of falsehood

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, unto thee O God שִׁ֣יר <S%H7891><s%> shir I will sing חָ֭דָשׁ <S%H2319><s%> Cha-dosh a new אָשִׁ֣ירָה <S%H7892><s%> 'a-Shi-rah song לָּ֑ךְ Lach; בְּנֵ֥בֶל <S%H5035><s%> be-Ne-vel upon a psaltery עָ֝שׂ֗וֹר <S%H6218><s%> a-Sor, [and] an instrument of ten strings אֲזַמְּרָה־ <S%H2167><s%> 'a-zam-me-rah- will I sing praises לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> han-no-Ten [It is he] that giveth תְּשׁוּעָ֗ה <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah, salvation לַמְּלָ֫כִ֥ים <S%H4428><s%> lam-me-La-Chim unto kings הַ֭פּוֹצֶה <S%H6475><s%> Hap-po-tzeh who delivereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David עַבְדּ֗וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do, his servant מֵחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> me-Che-rev sword רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah. from the hurtful

פְּצֵ֥נִי <S%H6475><s%> pe-Tze-ni Rid וְהַצִּילֵנִי֮ <S%H5337><s%> ve-hatz-tzi-le-Ni me and deliver מִיַּ֪ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad me from the hand בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- children נֵ֫כָ֥ר <S%H5236><s%> ne-Char of strange אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Whose פִּ֭יהֶם <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hem whose mouth דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- speaketh שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> Shav; vanity וִֽ֝ימִינָ֗ם <S%H3225><s%> vi-mi-Nam, and their right hand יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> ye-Min [is] a right hand שָֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> Sha-ker. of falsehood

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Let בָּנֵ֨ינוּ׀ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-nu That our sons כִּנְטִעִים֮ <S%H5195><s%> kin-ti-'Im [may be] as plants מְגֻדָּלִ֪ים <S%H1431><s%> me-gud-da-Lim grown up בִּֽנְעוּרֵ֫יהֶ֥ם <S%H5271><s%> bin-'u-Rei-Hem in their youth בְּנוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tei-nu [that] our daughters כְזָוִיֹּ֑ת <S%H2106><s%> che-za-vi-Yot; [may be] as corner stones מְ֝חֻטָּב֗וֹת <S%H2404><s%> me-chut-ta-Vot, polished תַּבְנִ֥ית <S%H8403><s%> tav-Nit [after] the similitude הֵיכָֽל׃ <S%H1964><s%> hei-Chal. of a palace

מְזָוֵ֣ינוּ <S%H4200><s%> me-za-Vei-nu [That] our garners מְלֵאִים֮ <S%H4392><s%> me-le-'Im [may be] full מְפִיקִ֥ים <S%H6329><s%> me-fi-Kim affording מִזַּ֗ן <S%H2177><s%> miz-Zan, every אֶ֫ל־ <S%H413><s%> 'El- about זַ֥ן <S%H2177><s%> zan kind צֹאונֵ֣נוּ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ne-nu [that] our sheep מַ֭אֲלִיפוֹת <S%H503><s%> Ma-'a-li-fot may bring forth thousands מְרֻבָּב֗וֹת <S%H7231><s%> me-rub-ba-Vot, and ten thousands בְּחוּצוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H2351><s%> be-chu-tzo-Tei-nu. in our streets

אַלּוּפֵ֗ינוּ <S%H441><s%> 'al-lu-Fei-nu, [That] our oxen מְֽסֻבָּ֫לִ֥ים <S%H5445><s%> me-sub-Ba-Lim [may be] strong to labour אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- Without פֶּ֭רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> Pe-retz [that there be] no breaking in וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and without יוֹצֵ֑את <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tzet; nor going out וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein no צְ֝וָחָ֗ה <S%H6682><s%> tze-va-Chah, that [there be] no complaining בִּרְחֹבֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H7339><s%> bir-cho-Tei-nu. in our streets

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Happy הָ֭עָם <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'om [is that] people שֶׁכָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> shek-Ka-chah that is in such a case לּ֑וֹ lo; אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei [yea] happy הָ֝עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, [is that] people שֶׁיֲהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav. whose God
